lessons.japanese: 兄弟がいるとどんなだろうといつも思う。
lessons.indonesian: I've always wondered what it'd be like to have siblings.

lessons.japanese: 10ヶ国語を話せたらどんなにかっこいいだろう！
lessons.indonesian: It would be so cool if I could speak ten languages!

lessons.japanese: 朝ごはんはどんなもの食べてるの？
lessons.indonesian: What do you have for breakfast?
